lead_paragraph: A three-way bidding war appears to have broken out for Healthscope, with Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and Tenet Healthcare reportedly joining the race to buy the Australian hospital operator.
snippet: A three-way bidding war appears to have broken out for Healthscope, with Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and Tenet Healthcare reportedly joining the race to buy the Australian hospital operator.

headline.main: K.K.R. and Tenet Said to Join Race for Healthscope

abstract: A three-way bidding war appears to have broken out for Healthscope, with Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and Tenet Healthcare reportedly joining the race to buy the Australian hospital operator.
